p: The n-hexane extract (3.0 g) of the roots of O. cufodontii was also fractionated over silica gel (150 g) column chromatography with increasing polarity of EtOAc in n-hexane as eluent to give 24 fractions, each 100 mL. Fraction 4 eluted with n-hexane:EtOAc (85:15) furnished compound 2 (32 mg) as yellow crystals. Fraction 10 eluted with n-hexane:EtOAc (4:1) is identified as compound 3 (32 mg).
